크레이그 R. 맥클라나한 컨텐트 테이블
이 매뉴얼은 톰캣 프로젝트 개발자 커뮤니티의 많은 멤버들로부터 기여를 받았습니다. 다음의 저자는 상당한 컨텐트를 제공하였습니다:
크레이그 R. 맥클라나한 (craigmcc@apache.org)
제공되는 정보는 다음과 같은 부문으로 나뉘어져 있습니다.:
소개 - Briefly describes the information covered here, with links and references to other sources of information.
설치 - Covers acquiring and installing the required software components to use Tomcat for web application development.
Deployment Organization - Discusses the standard directory layout for a web application (defined in the Servlet API Specification), the Web Application Deployment Descriptor, and options for integration with Tomcat in your development environment.
소스 조직 - Describes a useful approach to organizing the source code directories for your project, and introduces the build.xml used by Ant to manage compilation.
개발 과정 - Provides brief descriptions of typical development processes utilizing the recommended deployment and source organizations.
예제 애플리케이션 - This directory contains a very simple, but functionally complete, "Hello, World" application built according to the principles described in this manual. You can use this application to practice using the described techniques.
